1.subject: Welcome
1.message:
Dear John, 
On behalf of Iron Corp, I would like to welcome you to the company. Here at Iron Corp we strive to bring the brightest minds together, to create the brightest future. There's no doubt in my mind that the work you accoplish here will change the world.
Best of luck,
Cassandra Palmer

2.subject: Yoga
2.message:
Hey Kevin,
I know you've been going through something these past few days. Just want to check in.
Last year my mom went through something similar, but she started going to hot yoga and it really helped! It was a place called Namaste, you should look into it. I hear it can be good for paranoia.
All the best,
Jason

3.subject: Welcome
3.message:
Hi KEVIN!
Thanks for opening a new life insurance account with us. We're so glad to have you!
We'll reach out soon with the next steps.
Thanks for putting your life in our hands,
Abigail


Sentinel Insurance Associate

4.subject: HR Meeting
4.message:
Hello Kevin,
Please report to HR at 9:30 AM today.
Warmly,
Lenny
